name: Easy Tetris
description:
You suck at Tetris but still want to impress your friends?

Easy Tetris is the solution for all of your problems! Pick the piece you want to drop, including the speed, and the rest is up to you!

The game comes packed with two full length tracks of music, the original Type A and Type B songs!

Controls:
Keyboard arrows (left/right): Move
Up arrow: Rotate
Down arrow:  Move down
Spacebar: Hard drop

Alternatively A/D - move, Q/E - rotate.
